se.sics.isl.gui

Class DotDiagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • se.sics.isl.gui.DotDiagram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class DotDiagram
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    A simple dot diagram with support for several dot lines and any number of constant lines.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
